data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yu-Long, Xu, Qiang, Zhang, Dao-Chuan (2015): Three new species of the genus Conophyma Zubovsky, 1898 (Orthoptera, Acridoidea, Catantopidae, Conophyminae) from Xinjiang, China. Zootaxa 4039 (4): 575-582, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4039.4.7
